name: curl
description: Curl library bindings for neko/php. This project based on knarf's "curl" (http://lib.haxe.org/p/curl/) and Raza Tiana's "haxe-curl" (http://code.google.com/p/haxe-curl/) projects.
releasenote: Recompile windows version with old libcurl (openssl from 1.0 to 0.9). Move sources from google to bitbucket.
